name: writing-tools-mcp
description: MCP server providing advanced text analysis tools including readability scores, keyword analysis, AI detection, and stylometric analysis
long_description:
This MCP server provides comprehensive writing analysis tools designed to help improve text quality and detect AI-generated content. Features include:

- **Basic Statistics**: Character count, word count, spell checking
- **Readability Analysis**: Flesch Reading Ease, Flesch-Kincaid Grade, Gunning Fog Index at document, section, and paragraph levels
- **Keyword Analysis**: Keyword density, frequency, top keywords extraction, and context-aware keyword search
- **Style Analysis**: Passive voice detection using advanced NLP
- **AI Detection**: Perplexity analysis using GPT-2 and stylometric feature analysis with statistical baselines

Perfect for writers, editors, researchers, and anyone looking to analyze and improve their writing.
